title: Why LOD 350 Matters for Renovation Projects
content:
When it comes to renovation projects, the level of detail in your BIM model can mean the difference between a smooth construction phase and costly change orders...

LOD 350 provides the precision needed for MEP coordination, clash detection, and accurate quantity takeoffs. Our recent project at The Castle demonstrated how ±3mm variance control prevented $280K in potential conflicts.

## Key Benefits
- Precise MEP routing
- Accurate clash detection
- Reliable quantity takeoffs
- Reduced RFIs during construction

title: X Thread: Point Cloud Processing Speed
content:
Thread: How we cut point cloud processing time by 60%

1/ Most scanning firms treat processing as an afterthought. We treat it as a competitive advantage.

2/ The secret? Parallel processing pipelines and automated QC checks that catch issues before they become expensive problems.

3/ Result: 3-5 week delivery instead of 8-12 weeks. Your design team isn't waiting on data.

4/ DM for our processing workflow whitepaper.

title: Silver Street Stories: The Blues Legacy of Clarksdale
content:
Long before the crossroads became a tourist destination, Silver Street was where the real magic happened...

The Big Muddy Inn sits at the heart of this history, where legends like Muddy Waters and John Lee Hooker once played for crowds of cotton workers and travelers passing through the Delta.

## The Golden Era
In the 1940s and 50s, Clarksdale was the epicenter of Delta blues...

title: Behind the Scenes: Virtual Production at Utopia Studios
content:
Virtual production isn't just for Hollywood anymore. At Utopia Studios, we're bringing LED wall technology to independent creators...

Our recent production for a Hudson Valley tourism campaign demonstrated how virtual backgrounds can transport viewers without the travel budget.

## The Setup
- 20ft curved LED wall
- Unreal Engine real-time rendering
- Motion capture integration

title: Matterport vs Engineering-Grade Scanning: Know the Difference
content:
Not all 3D scanning is created equal. While Matterport excels at virtual tours, it wasn't designed for construction documentation...

## The Accuracy Gap
Matterport: ±30mm tolerance
Engineering-grade: ±3mm tolerance

That 10x difference matters when you're coordinating MEP systems or verifying structural dimensions.

history.feedback: Tone is too aggressive toward Matterport. Reframe as 'right tool for the job' rather than competitor bashing.

metadata.lastFeedback: Tone is too aggressive toward Matterport. Reframe as 'right tool for the job' rather than competitor bashing.

title: X Thread: Building in Public - Week 3
content:
Thread: Building SuperChase OS in public - Week 3 update

1/ This week we shipped: Today's Focus dashboard widget, S2P Lead Radar API, and fixed the sidebar (finally).

2/ The whale lead system is now live. Already identified a $350K opportunity at CUNY Baruch.

3/ Next up: Review queue integration and mobile quick actions.

4/ Follow along as we build the AI-powered business operating system.
